Sharpclaws::


Sharpclaws though a while scorponok's question "Now you're in our 
side -You have no reason to be worry about, Darkfate could know that 
we're on the way now. Don't worry about the past... "


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> "Well" Scorponok say cautiously, "I serve the Predacon ideology, 
Megatron
> just happened to carry it" thoughfully he continues "I guess if we 
have to
> stop him for it. How come you dont accuse me though, as I was his 
closest
> associate."
